What is the future of EVs in India?
Indian government fully support electric vehicles and want to replace fossil fuel-based vehicles with Evs. In 2017 transport Minister Nitin Gadkari has released a statement regarding the future of electric vehicles in India. According to him, he wants to see the only electric vehicles...
